mapper.sql:
SELECT dami.api_nm, dahr.dmnd_dt, COALESCE(dcms.sso_user_id, dcms.onepass_di) AS S4Id, dcms.bzmn_sn AS S4BZSN, dahr.rqstr_sn, COALESCE(dcms2.sso_user_id, dcms2.onepass_di) AS S1Id, dcms2.bzmn_sn AS S1BZSN, dcmc.cd_expln AS rslt_msg, dahr.dmnd_cnt, CASE WHEN dahr.dln ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CONCAT(REPEAT('*', LENGTH(dahr.dln) - 4), SUBSTRING(dahr.dln FROM LENGTH(dahr.dln) - 4)) ELSE '*******' || SUBSTRING(dqvs.pca_decrypt(dahr.dln, '150'), 8) END AS dln2, dahr.dln, dahr.req_hr FROM dqvs.dvs_api_hs_req AS dahr LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_api_mt_info AS dami ON dami.api_sn = dahr.api_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code AS dcmc ON dcmc.cd = dahr.dmnd_rslt_cd LEFT JOIN dqvs.v_intg_user_admin_info AS dcms ON dcms.user_sn = dahr.user_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.v_intg_user_admin_info AS dcms2 ON dcms2.user_sn = dahr.rqstr_sn WHERE dahr.dmnd_ymd >= #{startPicker02} and dahr.dmnd_ymd <= #{endPicker02}
and dahr.user_sn = #{userSn}::numeric
and dahr.api_sn = #{searchSttsCd}::numeric
and dahr.dmnd_rslt_cd = '200'
and dahr.dmnd_rslt_cd != '200'

( SELECT CONCAT(drma1.co_nm, '(', T1.S4Id, ')') AS rq, CONCAT( COALESCE(drma2.co_nm, drma1.co_nm), '(', COALESCE(T1.S1Id, T1.S4Id), ')' ) AS orq, T1.api_nm, T1.dmnd_dt, T1.rslt_msg, T1.dmnd_cnt, T1.dln2, T1.req_hr FROM (
) AS T1 LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency AS drma1 ON T1.S4BZSN = drma1.bzmn_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency AS drma2 ON T1.S1BZSN = drma2.bzmn_sn ) as JJ1
mapper.select:
SELECT count(JJ1.*) FROM WHERE 1 = 1
and orq LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchReq}) || '%'
and rq LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchReq}) || '%'

select count(*) from ( SELECT count(dahr.stts_cd), CASE WHEN dahr.stts_cd ='1' THEN '신청' WHEN dahr.stts_cd = '2' THEN '활용' WHEN dahr.stts_cd = '3' THEN '반려' ELSE '중지' END AS status FROM dqvs.dvs_api_mt_stts dahr JOIN dqvs.dvs_api_mt_info dami ON dahr.api_sn = dami.api_sn WHERE dahr.user_sn = #{UserSn}::numeric AND dahr.dmnd_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startPicker02}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endPicker02}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
AND dahr.stts_cd = '1'
AND dahr.stts_cd = '2'
AND dahr.stts_cd = '3'
AND dahr.stts_cd = '4'
group by dahr.stts_cd ) a
mapper.sql:
( SELECT CONCAT(drma1.co_nm, '(', T1.S4Id, ')') AS rq, CONCAT( COALESCE(drma2.co_nm, drma1.co_nm), '(', COALESCE(T1.S1Id, T1.S4Id), ')' ) AS orq, T1.api_nm, T1.dmnd_dt, T1.rslt_msg, T1.dmnd_cnt, case when t1.dln ~ '^[0-9]+$' then CONCAT(REPEAT('*', LENGTH(t1.dln) - 4), SUBSTRING(t1.dln from LENGTH(t1.dln) - 4)) else '*******' || SUBSTRING(dqvs.pca_decrypt(t1.dln, '150'), 8) end as dln2, T1.req_hr FROM ( SELECT dami.api_nm, dahr.dmnd_dt, COALESCE(dcms.sso_user_id, dcms.onepass_di) AS S4Id, dcms.bzmn_sn AS S4BZSN, dahr.rqstr_sn, COALESCE(dcms2.sso_user_id, dcms2.onepass_di) AS S1Id, dcms2.bzmn_sn AS S1BZSN, dcmc.cd_expln AS rslt_msg, dahr.dmnd_cnt, dahr.dln, dahr.req_hr FROM dqvs.dvs_api_hs_req_dev AS dahr LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_api_mt_info AS dami ON dami.api_sn = dahr.api_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code AS dcmc ON dcmc.cd = dahr.dmnd_rslt_cd LEFT JOIN dqvs.v_intg_user_admin_info AS dcms ON dcms.user_sn = dahr.user_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.v_intg_user_admin_info AS dcms2 ON dcms2.user_sn = dahr.rqstr_sn WHERE dahr.dmnd_dt >= #{startPicker02}::TIMESTAMP and dahr.dmnd_dt <= #{endPicker02}::DATE + '23:59:59'::INTERVAL
and dahr.user_sn = #{userSn}::numeric
and dahr.api_sn = #{searchSttsCd}::numeric
and dahr.dmnd_rslt_cd = '200'
and dahr.dmnd_rslt_cd != '200'
) AS T1 LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency AS drma1 ON T1.S4BZSN = drma1.bzmn_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency AS drma2 ON T1.S1BZSN = drma2.bzmn_sn ) as JJ1
mapper.select:

and orq LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchReq}) || '%'
and rq LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchReq}) || '%'
select api_nm, api_sn from dqvs.dvs_api_mt_info order by api_sn asc
